display.title: Better Flight!
description: The Advanced Nano Chestplate combines protection, a personal battery and an &&6enhanced Jetpack&&r, all in one.
To &&denable charging&&r, sneak right-click with it in your hand, then equip it (There may be an occasional bug where it refuses to charge, but you'll forgive us, right?).
Note that this stores &&oa lot&&r of energy, and uses it fairly fast. You may want to invest in a &&3HV Turbo Charger&&r.

subtitle.text: Quite the microcrafting project... but worth it
